title: The intricate economics of terrorism
description: Loretta Napoleoni details her rare opportunity to talk to the secretive Italian Red Brigades -- an experience that sparked a lifelong interest in terrorism. She gives a behind-the-scenes look at its complex economics, revealing a surprising connection between money laundering and the US Patriot Act.
author: Loretta Napoleoni
keywords: TED, talks, corruption, economics, global issues, money, terrorism
